hero.title: Flashcards built for school and classrooms
hero.description: The simple, powerful way for teachers to create study materials and for students to learn. Designed specifically for educational environments.

features.title: Everything you need
features.description: Simple tools that make a real difference in the classroom

decks.title: Decks
decks.description: Organize flashcards into subject-specific decks. Create, share, and reuse across classes.

classrooms.title: Classrooms
classrooms.description: Invite students, assign decks, and track progress. All in one collaborative space.

dashboards.title: Dashboards
dashboards.description: Teachers get a bird's-eye view of classroom activity, completion rates, and student engagement.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Detailed insights into individual and class performance. Identify who needs extra help.

platforms.title: Available everywhere
platforms.description: Study at school, at home, or on the bus. Your flashcards sync across all your devices.
